sentences.en: A sensation of burning or tingling may be experienced in the hands.
sentences.cn: 双手可能会有种刺痛感或灼热感。

sentences.en: Floating can be a very pleasant sensation.
sentences.cn: 漂浮会是一种非常惬意的感觉。

sentences.en: He lost all sensation in his legs through cramp.
sentences.cn: 他的腿部因抽筋而失去知觉.

sentences.en: His unexpected success caused a sensation.
sentences.cn: 他出人意料的成功引起了轰动.

sentences.en: I felt the strangest sensation of fear and exhilaration.
sentences.cn: 我有一种既害怕又快乐的感觉.

sentences.en: I had a queer sensation as if a worm was creeping down my spine.
sentences.cn: 我有一种可疑的感觉,好象有个虫子在顺着我的脊梁往下爬似的.

sentences.en: If you read the papers, you know there was a big sensation. "
sentences.cn: 各位看报就知道那是轰动一时的事件. ”

sentences.en: It's a funny sensation to know someone's talking about you in a language you don't understand.
sentences.cn: 知道有人正用一种你听不懂的语言谈论你，这种感觉很奇怪。

sentences.en: Jerry realized that he had no sensation in his legs.
sentences.cn: 杰里意识到自己双腿都没有了知觉。

sentences.en: One sign of a heart attack is a tingling sensation in the left arm.
sentences.cn: 心脏病发作的一个征兆是左臂有刺痛感。

sentences.en: Seeing him again after so many years was a strange sensation.
sentences.cn: 那么多年以后又见到他,是一种不可思议的感觉.

sentences.en: She was just 14 when she caused a sensation at the Montreal Olympics.
sentences.cn: 她在蒙特利尔奥运会上引起轰动时才14岁。

sentences.en: She was possessed of a terrifying sensation that the life was being squeezed slowly out of her.
sentences.cn: 她有一种可怕的感觉，自己的生命正在慢慢凋零。

sentences.en: The new book has created a great sensation.
sentences.cn: 这本新书引起了巨大轰动.

sentences.en: The pain was so bad that she lost all sensation.
sentences.cn: 太疼了，疼得她都失去了知觉。

sentences.en: The sex scenes in the film caused a sensation.
sentences.cn: 这部影片中的性爱镜头引起了轰动。

sentences.en: These lotions tend to give the skin a tingly sensation.
sentences.cn: 这些润肤乳往往会使皮肤有刺痛感。

sentences.en: Working with one's head causes a sensation of hunger quite as much as muscular work.
sentences.cn: 脑力劳动与体力劳动引起的饥饿感觉是完全一样的.
